StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetTrainingEvalTasks]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingEvalID uniqueidentifier AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT t.ID, g.Title, t.Name, t.Descrip.on, t.CanPerform FROM USMC.TrainingEvalTask t, USMC.TrainingEvalTaskGroup g WHERE t.TrainingEvalID = @TrainingEvalID AND t.TaskGroupID=g.ID ORDER BY t.TaskGroupID, t.Name
END
